intent.story_goal: Subject trapped in recursive hallucination loop inside collapsing architecture
intent.scene_goal: Maximize terror through impossible spatial geometry and temporal fracture

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Immediate maximum dread — no warmup
Terror intensifies through spatial impossibility
Peak fear — reality fractures completely
Sustained terror — no resolution allowed

beats.action: Subject enters corridor that folds back onto itself
Walls contract — geometry becomes non-Euclidean
Exit door opens into the same room — time loops

layers.statement: Architecture as consciousness trap — the building is the mind devouring itself

canon.statement: The corridor has no measurable length — instruments fail upon entry

intent.story_goal: Subject witnesses irreversible injustice perpetrated by authority figure
intent.scene_goal: Channel fury through restraint — anger as cold precision not explosion

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Cold anger building from witnessed injustice
Fury crystallizes into focused rage
Peak controlled rage — violence contained
Anger hardens into permanent resolve

beats.action: Subject observes authority figure destroying evidence
Victim collapses — authority figure steps over them
Subject clenches jaw, memorizes every detail
beats.emotion_instruction: Fury transforms into cold weaponized memory

layers.statement: Memory as weapon — witnessing becomes evidence-gathering

banned_cliches: son sang ne fit qu'un tour

canon.statement: The authority figure holds absolute jurisdictional immunity — no legal recourse exists

intent.story_goal: Subject discovers biological contamination spreading through sealed facility
intent.scene_goal: Generate visceral revulsion through organic decay and contagion imagery

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Initial revulsion from environmental contamination
Disgust intensifies as contamination becomes personal
Peak revulsion — body horror element
Sustained nausea — contamination is irreversible

terminal_state.reader_state: Persistent nausea — physical revulsion without relief

beats.action: Subject enters sealed lab — biohazard signs corroded
Walls covered in unknown biological growth pulsing rhythmically
Growth reaches Subject — first contact on skin
beats.emotion_instruction: Body horror — contamination is now personal

layers.statement: Contamination as metaphor for irreversible moral corruption

canon.statement: The biological growth is unclassified — no known taxonomy matches its structure

intent.story_goal: Subject revisits site of childhood home now demolished — erasure of identity
intent.scene_goal: Absolute grief through absence — what is missing is the weapon

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Immediate crushing sadness from void where home was
Grief deepens through inventory of lost objects
Peak despair — identity itself has been demolished
Catatonic sadness — beyond tears

beats.action: Subject stands before empty lot where childhood home stood
beats.emotion_instruction: Void as the most violent image

beats.action: Wind carries dust from foundation — last physical trace dissolving
Subject sits on bare ground where bedroom was — stops moving

layers.statement: Demolished home as demolished self — architecture of identity razed

banned_cliches: plus rien ne serait comme avant

canon.statement: The demolition was administrative — no prior notice given to former residents

intent.story_goal: Subject observes former mentor reduced to sycophantic self-parody
intent.scene_goal: Pure contempt through surgical observation — dissection without anger

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Clinical contempt — observation without emotional investment
Contempt sharpens through accumulation of pathetic details
Peak contempt — mentor is beyond redemption
Contempt settles into permanent dismissal

terminal_state.reader_state: Cold permanent dismissal — the mentor no longer exists as person

beats.action: Subject watches mentor perform obsequious greeting to inferior
Mentor laughs at own joke — nobody else does
beats.emotion_instruction: Contempt crystallizes at precise moment of self-deception

beats.action: Subject turns away without greeting — mentor does not notice
beats.emotion_instruction: Final dismissal — absence of acknowledgment as verdict

layers.statement: The mentor is a mirror of what Subject refuses to become

canon.statement: The mentor once published a manifesto on intellectual integrity — now contradicts every principle

intent.story_goal: Subject discovers their past action caused irreversible harm to innocent
intent.scene_goal: Crushing guilt through forensic reconstruction of causal chain

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Dawning realization of culpability
Guilt intensifies as causal chain becomes clear
Peak remorse — the harm is proven and irreversible
Guilt solidifies into permanent self-condemnation

beats.action: Subject reads forensic report linking their decision to the outcome
Each line of the report tightens the noose of culpability
Subject closes the report — hands remain on the cover
beats.emotion_instruction: Weight of permanent guilt — body cannot release the evidence

layers.statement: The report is a mirror — every page reflects the Subject back as perpetrator

banned_cliches: le sol se déroba sous ses pieds
plus rien ne serait comme avant

canon.statement: The forensic report contains 47 pages — each one links a specific decision to a specific harm

intent.story_goal: Subject realizes surveillance system has been watching them for years
intent.scene_goal: Paranoid dread through accumulation of retroactive evidence

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: First anomaly noticed — seed of paranoia
Pattern recognition — surveillance evidence accumulates
Full paranoid cascade — nowhere is safe
Sustained dread — watcher is always present

terminal_state.reader_state: Permanent paranoid vigilance — safety is illusion

beats.action: Subject finds photograph of themselves from an angle only surveillance could capture
Review of old emails reveals metadata inconsistencies — someone has read everything
Subject checks room for devices — finds three
beats.emotion_instruction: Privacy was never real — the watcher is infrastructure

layers.statement: Surveillance as omniscient narrator — the Subject was never the protagonist

canon.statement: The surveillance predates Subject's acquisition of the property by 6 years

intent.story_goal: Subject confronts bureaucracy that destroyed their family through administrative indifference
intent.scene_goal: White-hot rage constrained by institutional walls — violence of impotence

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Rage immediate upon entering the institution
Bureaucratic indifference amplifies fury
Maximum rage — system is designed to be unaccountable
Rage becomes permanent architecture of self

terminal_state.reader_state: Permanent structural rage — system cannot be fought

beats.action: Subject enters government building — takes a number
Clerk processes the complaint with zero affect — stamps denied
Subject exits — the building continues operating as if nothing happened
beats.emotion_instruction: The system does not register individual suffering

layers.statement: The building is the violence — architecture as oppression apparatus

banned_cliches: son sang ne fit qu'un tour

canon.statement: The administrative procedure has no appeal mechanism — denial is final by design

intent.story_goal: Subject forced to consume contaminated substance during coerced ritual
intent.scene_goal: Maximize visceral disgust through forced ingestion and loss of bodily autonomy

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Revulsion at coerced participation in ritual
Physical disgust escalates with proximity to substance
Peak revulsion during forced ingestion
Internalized contamination — body as violated territory

terminal_state.reader_state: Permanent contamination — body no longer belongs to self

beats.action: Subject presented with the substance — texture and smell described
Coercion intensifies — refusal is not possible
Substance consumed — body rejects but cannot expel
beats.emotion_instruction: Contamination internalized — no return to previous state

layers.statement: Forced ingestion as metaphor for ideological coercion — what enters cannot be unlearned

canon.statement: The ritual requires complete ingestion — partial compliance is treated as defiance

intent.story_goal: Subject receives last communication from someone who has already died
intent.scene_goal: Temporal grief — message from the dead arrives after the funeral

curve_quartiles.narrative_instruction: Quiet shock — the dead have written
Each word of the message reopens the wound
Peak grief — the dead did not know they were dying
Residual grief — the message cannot be answered

terminal_state.reader_state: Unanswerable grief — communication with the dead is one-directional

beats.action: Subject opens delayed postal letter — recognizes handwriting of the deceased
beats.emotion_instruction: Shock of temporal collision — living hand reads dead hand's writing

beats.action: Letter contains plans for a shared future that will never happen
beats.emotion_instruction: Maximum grief — the dead made plans

beats.action: Subject folds the letter and places it in pocket — keeps it against skin
beats.emotion_instruction: Letter as relic — paper as last physical connection

layers.statement: The letter is a ghost — words that outlived their author

banned_metaphors: la lumière au bout du tunnel
la lumière au bout du tunnel

banned_cliches: plus rien ne serait comme avant

canon.statement: The letter was posted 3 days before death — postal delay caused it to arrive 2 weeks after the funeral
